description:
When facing a family law issue or planning one’s estate, it is imperative for people to work with a reputable law firm. From our main office in Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio, Hoover Kacyon, LLC, represents people in such matters throughout Akron, Canton and Cleveland, as well as Summit and Cuyahoga counties.

 

Our law firm is headed by Corinne Hoover Six and her brother, Tad Orval Hoover. As members of a strong legal family, they understand the importance of providing clients with sound advice and customized solutions. This may include helping clients put together a complete list of assets, calculating spousal support or drafting a will.

 

Our legal professionals look to the future, constantly gleaning new information and tools from their participation in groups such as the Ohio State Bar Association and the Akron Bar Association’s Family Law Section. In turn, this provides our clients with the latest strategies and the assurance that their matter will be handled with competence.

 

Hoover Kacyon, LLC, is a full-service law firm. Each of our attorneys is dedicated to a practice area, such as criminal law, bankruptcy, education law, commercial litigation or personal injury. We are happy to accommodate our clients’ needs whatever they may be. Additionally, we offer free initial consultations, accept credit cards, and we consistently go the extra mile to help our clients meet their goals for their case.

 

* We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
